[source, js]

const response = await client.search({
  index: "log-messages",
  filter_path: "aggregations",
  aggs: {
    daily: {
      date_histogram: {
        field: "time",
        fixed_interval: "1d",
      },
      aggs: {
        categories: {
          categorize_text: {
            field: "message",
            categorization_filters: ["\\w+\\_\\d{3}"],
          },
          aggs: {
            hit: {
              top_hits: {
                size: 1,
                sort: ["time"],
                _source: "message",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
